title: ROBB FLYNN of MACHINE HEAD Joins GOJIRA On Stage For Performance of SEPULTURA's "Territory"
description: A nice birthday surprise for Flynn, and for fans. The post ROBB FLYNN of MACHINE HEAD Joins GOJIRA On Stage For Performance of SEPULTURA's "Territory" appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: A nice birthday surprise for Flynn, and for fans.
text: Last evening in Athens, Greece was Gojira's most recent stop on their current European festival run, and Gojira invited Machine Head's frontman, Robb Flynn, to join them for a cover of Sepultura's "Territory." Filmed by fans, the four minute cover raged on, as Gojira and Flynn gave them a hell of a performance. Check out some of the fan footage below, as well as the Gojira's remaining European summer festival tour dates. 22 July – Istanbul, Turkey @ Kucukciftlik Park25 July – Plovdiv, Bulgaria @ Hills of Rock 202527 July – Zagreb, Croatia @ SRC Šalata29 July – Carcassonne, France @ Festival De Carcassonne 202531 July – Braşov, Romania @ Rockstadt Extreme Festival 20252 August – Wacken, Germany @ Wacken Open Air 20255 August – Lokeren, Belgium @ Lokerse Feesten7 August – Jaroměř, Czech Republic @ Brutal Assault 202510 August – Walton-On-Trent, UK @ Bloodstock Open Air 202512 August – Oberhausen, Germany @ Turbinenhalle14 August – Dinkelsbühl, Germany @ Summer Breeze Open Air 202515 August – Sulingen, Germany @ Reload Festival 202517 August – Eindhoven, Netherlands @ Dynamo Metal Fest 202519 August – Krakau, Poland @ Tauron Arena21 August – Vilnius, Lithuania @ Lukiškiu Kalėjimas 2.0 Want More Metal? html:
Last evening in Athens, Greece was Gojira's most recent stop on their current European festival run, and Gojira invited Machine Head's frontman, Robb Flynn, to join them for a cover of Sepultura's "Territory."

Filmed by fans, the four minute cover raged on, as Gojira and Flynn gave them a hell of a performance.

Check out some of the fan footage below, as well as the Gojira's remaining European summer festival tour dates.

22 July – Istanbul, Turkey @ Kucukciftlik Park
25 July – Plovdiv, Bulgaria @ Hills of Rock 2025
27 July – Zagreb, Croatia @ SRC Šalata
29 July – Carcassonne, France @ Festival De Carcassonne 2025
31 July – Braşov, Romania @ Rockstadt Extreme Festival 2025
2 August – Wacken, Germany @ Wacken Open Air 2025
5 August – Lokeren, Belgium @ Lokerse Feesten
7 August – Jaroměř, Czech Republic @ Brutal Assault 2025
10 August – Walton-On-Trent, UK @ Bloodstock Open Air 2025
12 August – Oberhausen, Germany @ Turbinenhalle
14 August – Dinkelsbühl, Germany @ Summer Breeze Open Air 2025
15 August – Sulingen, Germany @ Reload Festival 2025
17 August – Eindhoven, Netherlands @ Dynamo Metal Fest 2025
19 August – Krakau, Poland @ Tauron Arena
21 August – Vilnius, Lithuania @ Lukiškiu Kalėjimas 2.0
